00053 #ifdef __Extended_Version
00054 void MSD_execTranslateCurrentCamera(void)
00055 {
00056    float f1, f2, f3;
00057 
00058    while (3 != sscanf(restbuf, "%f %f %f", &f1, &f2, &f3))
00059    {
00060       printf("TranslateCurrentCamera: dEx dEy dEz\n");
00061       if (!lineins("? "))
00062       {
00063          return;
00064       }
00065    }
00066    MSD_lowTranslateCurrentCamera(f1, f2, f3);
00067 }
00068 
00069 #endif
00070 
00071 void MSD_lowTranslateCurrentCamera(real dEx, real dEy, real dEz)
00072 {
00073    CTYPE *cptr;
00074    real  Ex, Ey, Ez, Rx, Ry, Rz, ampl;
00075    int   mode, elim, hash, edge;
00076 
00077    cptr = camptr;
00078    Ex   = cptr->eye[0] + dEx;
00079    Ey   = cptr->eye[1] + dEy;
00080    Ez   = cptr->eye[2] + dEz;
00081    Rx   = cptr->ref[0];
00082    Ry   = cptr->ref[1];
00083    Rz   = cptr->ref[2];
00084    ampl = cptr->scale;
00085    mode = cptr->mode;
00086    hash = cptr->dash;
00087    elim = cptr->hid;
00088    edge = cptr->smooth;
00089    MSD_highSetCamera(cptr, Ex, Ey, Ez, Rx, Ry, Rz, ampl, mode, elim, hash, edge);
00090 }
